shortdesc.ph: Starts an audio recording device test.

section.p: Call this method to test whether the local audio recording device is working properly. After the call, the SDK triggers the callback at the specified interval, reporting the volume information of the recording device with uid 0. This method only tests the local audio recording device, while the method can also test audio/video devices and network conditions.
section.note: Call this method before joining a channel. After the test is complete, call before joining a channel to stop the test.

plentry.pd: The time interval (ms) for triggering the callback. This value must be greater than 10. Otherwise, the callback will not be received and the SDK returns error code -2. A value of 100 is recommended.

ul.li:
< 0: Failure.
-2: Invalid parameter. Please check the parameter settings.
